type.name: state_definition_condition
type.description: Do we need the probability of these conditions arising?

select.selectitems: Failure Failure_mode Periodicity_predicted State_definition State_transition_definition Symptom_definition

entity.name: And_state_definition_relationship
entity.description: And state definition relationship desribes relationships between two or more given state definitions. It is intended to cover NPDM and_consequential_failure_relationship.

entity.name: Applied_state_definition_assignment
entity.description: Applied state definition assignment is an association of a state definition with product data.

entity.name: Composition_of_state_definition
entity.description: A composition of state definition composes a state definition.

entity.name: Or_state_definition_relationship
entity.description: Or state definition relationship desribes relationships between one or more given state definitions. It is intended to cover NPDM or_consequential_failure_relationship.

entity.name: Periodicity_predicted
entity.description: Periodicity predicted describes expected frequency of a related state transition definition.

entity.name: Proper_subset
entity.description: A proper subset is a relationship that relates an aspect of one state definition to an aspect in a different state definition.

entity.name: Sequence_of_state_definition
entity.description: A sequence of state definition describes and relates an order of state definitions.

entity.name: State_cause_effect_definition
entity.description: A state cause effect definition describes and relates types of causes and effects from a given state definition.

entity.name: State_complement
entity.description: A state complement is a relationship that relates types of state definitions to other types of state definitions.

entity.name: State_definition
entity.description: A state definition is a type of state.

entity.name: State_definition_relationship
entity.description: A state definition relationship describes a relationship between state definitions. This can be a diagnostic process.

entity.name: State_definition_relationship_relationship
entity.description: A state definition relationship relationship describes a relationship between state definition relationships.

entity.name: State_transition_definition
entity.description: A state transition definition describes and relates a transition from one state definition to another state definition.

entity.name: Subset
entity.description: A subset is a relationship that relates an aspect of one state definition to an aspect in another state definition. Note, the second state definition may be equal to the first state definition.

entity.name: Symptom_definition
entity.description: A symptom definition describes and relates cause and effect of a symptom from a given state definition. This can be the detection method.

entity.name: Xor_state_definition_relationship
entity.description: Xor state definition relationship desribes relationships between one or more given state definitions. It is intended to cover NPDM xor_consequential_failure_relationship.
